record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - May 01, 2008)

[Page: H2961]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Members have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and to insert extraneous material on H.R. 493.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
